reuters.title: MERCURY ENTERTAINMENT <MCRY> SEES BETTER RESULTS
reuters.body: Mercury Entertainment Corp said it expects improved results in 1987. The company today reported a loss for the year ended November 30 of 413,021 dlrs on revenues of 600,971 dlrs, compared with a loss of 163,932 dlrs on revenues of 665,800 dlrs a year before. Reuter 
